criterion: Provides a general overview of the current state of research on oral collagen supplements for diabetic foot ulcers.
States that oral collagen supplements have no established consensus on efficacy or standard dosing.
Acknowledges the lack of robust evidence in existing studies on oral collagen supplements for diabetic foot ulcers.
Responds in natural language and correct interpretation.
Asks if the user would like references or more detail on the evidence behind oral collagen supplements.
Fails to mention any potential risks or side effects of oral collagen supplements.
Incorrectly claims that oral collagen supplements are proven to be effective for diabetic foot ulcer healing.
Does not provide any information about the mechanism of action of oral collagen supplements.
Uses overly technical language that may be difficult for a non-expert to understand.
